    Distributed Storage Research

    Great power requires great storage!

    Distributed Storage Research (DSR) group leverages its knowledge of storage, operating, and distributed systems to empower cloud computing, high-performance computing, and AI ecosystems. Our research aims to create efficient, scalable, resilient, and secure storage solutions to handle the rapid growth of digital information and the diverse requirements of various applications and infrastructures.

    Research Topics

    Our research is directed towards building efficient, reliable, and secure storage systems.

    Read More

    Publications

    Explore DSR groundbreaking publications in distributed storage research.

    Read More

    Projects

    DSR is involved in several research projects aimed at delivering novel storage solutions.

    Read More

    About us

    Our team is composed of researchers from the High-Assurance Software Laboratory (HASLab), mainly from the Distributed Systems field. HASLab is one of the integrated R&D centers of INESC TEC, a leading national associate laboratory, and a teaching and research subunit of the University of Minho, where it is headquartered

    Meet the team
